# Globant test

## Overview

This is the repository associated with the data science knowledge test. This is not a package generation attempt, but collects all the information needed to reproduce the test such as package functions and code. 

The [dataset](https://data.birmingham.gov.uk/dataset/purchase-card-transactions) to develop the test is a collection of purchase card transactions for the Birmingham City Council. 

```
├── cleaning_data.R
├── merge_data.R
├── analysis.R
├── descriptive_analysis.R
```
